data.title: Get Outta Town
data.meta_description: In the bygone days of ABC’s soaps, GENERAL HOSPITAL, ALL MY CHILDREN, ONE LIFE TO LIVE and RYAN’S HOPE were all about (going on) location! Location! Location!
data.text:
In the bygone days of ABC’s soaps, GENERAL HOSPITAL, ALL MY CHILDREN, ONE LIFE TO LIVE and RYAN’S HOPE were all about (going on) location! Location! Location!

For Emma Samms’ GH debut as Luke Spencer’s new love interest, Holly Sutton, in 1982, executive producer Gloria Monty took the actress and leading man Anthony Geary to the Franklin Canyon Reservoir in the Hollywood Hills. As you can see, the soap not only struck gold with the pairing, the budding couple struck oil, too! When RH married off supercouple Mary Ryan and Jack Fenelli in 1977, it wasn’t just the newlyweds who were sent to Ireland on their honeymoon—the show sent the couple’s portrayers, ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK’s Kate Mulgrew and Michael Levin, overseas as well! In 1987, OLTL’s Tina Lord schemed her way into a cool million bucks by blackmailing new husband Cord Roberts’ grandpa, Asa Buchanan, then spent the fortune buying herself the island of Devil’s…

You're reading a preview of

ABC Soaps In Depth (Digital) - 1 Issue, April 8, 2019
